text: Sahi page pe humari mulakat shuru nhin hui thi first year mein. Yaad hai tu mere room zor se ghusa tha aur maine tujhe deodorant dene se mana kr diya tha LMAO. Uske baad se kafi time tak humare beech aisi hi tension rehti thi. But now when I look back, to yhi sab cheezen bhi masoom hain yr. I hope tu bhi sab yaad krke hansta hoga.  Basketball chhorke saare sports mein bakchod hai tu. Aise bhi har jagah chaapta hai Bhatia. Aur bhai maaf kr de, vo injury intentional nhin thi ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Jaldi mil tujhe bohut saari ice cream khilata hun, taki tu mujhe vo bulana chhor de ğŸ˜‚. Maze to bohut kre hain yr humne. Chal cyaâ€¦
author: Vineet  Shukla

text: Yo bhai, got to know you in second year jab vo ek senior who should not be named ke chakkar mein apan kya kya nautanki kre the. You are one of the most talented civil guys I know. All the best!!

text: Golgappa kara karake maar hi dete us din to ek doosre ko ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Kafi late mile hum par aage Bangalore mein aise hi parties hoti rhengi. See you soon!!

text: Aviral brooo! Pehle school, phir coaching, phir same college, kafi lamba saath hai humara. Looking forward to more good times with you bhai. Keep smiling...

text:
Yo Ayush! You are an amazing. I am always inspired by how enthusiastic and hard working you always are. Tu humare group ka bhi FinEco ka assignment kr diya that LoL. Looking forward to more basketball games with you man. All the best and lots of love,

author: Vineet  Shukla

text: Saved the last memoir for the favourite person of college. Sharma tu heera hai. Itni saari masti kri hai humne milke. MT ke chakkar, Bithoor trip karaoke, Goa scooty rides, too many pukes, even more dry humps xDD, aur ram mandir pe charche bhi. Meri gallery bhari hui hai humari photos se, second year se lekar last ke college ke do mahine tak. Bohut aalsi hai tu Sharma, lekin abhi IIMA jake sab nikal jayega ğŸ˜‚. Jaldi milte hain phirse. Cya...
author: Vineet  Shukla

text: Yo bhai, there are so many memories with you I don't know where to begin with. Those countless basketball matches from second year. Tereko D block se uthake laate the main aur Harshit. Maine jitne baar bhi tujhe tap maara hai, vo saare moments yaad hain mujhe, because they are so few. You are the MJ tu my Kobe xD. Last ke do mahine mein vo evening ke chai sutta breaks. Kitne saare nightouts. Tere room ki vibe to main bohut miss krunga. Ab Bangalore mein vocals training krni hai LMAO. Love you bhai..
author: Vineet  Shukla

text:
Yo Dishaa!! I don't know why I haven't told you this before, but you are so much like Phoebe Bufffay. You are one crazy spontaneous person who I can count on for any mischief. We have had some amazing memories since second year. Humara intern mein videsh mein milne vala plan to successful nhin ho paya, but I am counting on you this time for future sudden meets, just like we met in Delhi. Lots of love,
Vineet
author: Vineet  Shukla

text: Hall 12 ki finale party mein kafi vibe kra tere saath. Maine bas trigger kra tha, saari bottles tune todi thin phir lmao. Concentration ka bar to tune aasmaan mein set kr rakha hai. Utkarsh pata nhin room mein kya kya kr chuka hai jab tu laptop mein ghusa rehta tha aur tujhe kuch bhi pata nhin ğŸ˜‚. Jaldi milte hain dost...
author: Vineet  Shukla

text:
Aur Paaji. Bohut din se koi nya gaana nhi suggest kra tune. Paaji you are one of the best people I know in Civil Engineering. Aur tu jitna bhi rr kr le par tu hai bohut chaapu. Ab to degree bhi ho gyi, ab to mere haath pi le ek baar xD. Chalo paaji milte rehna. Lots of love,
Vineet
author: Vineet  Shukla

text: Ghiisu bro!! We have had a blast these 4 years. Kaash tu last ke 2 mahine mein bhi a paata. Tujhe pata hai, tumne hi mujhe TV shows ki aadat lgvayi thi Sherlock dikhake first year mein ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. I could never really understand ki tu ek time pe kya kr rha hota tha. Tu padh rha hota tha, so bhi rha hota tha, aur beech beech mein crunches lagate bhi dikh jaata hai. Tere se zada fit aur tere se zada unhealthy diet kisi ki nhin thi wing mein ğŸ˜‚. Second year mein D-mid tak jaate the saath mein Dewansh ko laane basketball ke liye. Saare logon ko hum donon hi leke aate the. Sab tere se to convince ho hi jaate the, aur agar nhin hote the to tu unka laptop le aata tha ya unke hi bed pe so jaata tha ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£. Also that one time when we unexpectedly met in Delhi. Kafi maze kiye hain yr humne saath mein. I wish you a healthy and quick recovery bro. Aur uske baad phirse kuch acha plan banate hain. Jaldi milte hain. Cya!!
author: Vineet  Shukla

text:
"Yo Jay! Jaldi se court a ja" That one guy who never says no to baskie. You are an amazing person. Hope our paths cross again. With love,
Vineet
author: Vineet  Shukla

text:
Yo JD bro! With the minimal interaction I had with you outside court, you are one of the nicest guys I know in campus. And on court, you are literally Flash LMAO. Keep smiling, I hope our paths cross again. With love,
Vineet
author: Vineet  Shukla

text:
Tere saath to bro bas court aur gym mein hi interaction hua hai. You are an awesome player bro. I think I can mean it in more ways than one xD kyunki tu charming launda hai. Hope our paths cross again. Lots of love,
Vineet
author: Vineet  Shukla

text:
"Jaate jaate kuch awesome kr dein kya" ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Kevlin teri kilkari poore G block mein goonjti thin. Humari to kitni memories hain yr kahan se shuru krun. Is baar ki keechad vali holi to awesome hi thi, aur jaate jaate mere gharvalon se bhi mil liye tum. Ab Fajal ke saath Pune mein aise hi bakchodiyan krte rehna. I'll miss you brother. Lots of love,
Vineet

text: Hello Krishan bhai!! Zada interaction nhi hua hai humara labs ya lecture ke bahar par humesha maza aata tha tumse aur baki Hall 2 ke logon se interact krke. Chaapte rehna aage bhi. 669 ke liye shukriya. All the best man!!

text: Yo Dipak! Aate jaate hall 3 mein hi hello ho jaata tha, par interaction to mostly online hi hua hai. You are a fun guy, aur much lgta hai hum kafi vibe kr jayenge saath mein. Let's try to catch sometime soon bro. Cya...

text:

text: Mayur!! First year mein sabse seedha tha tu. Zada kuch badla nhin hai khair, abhi bhi seedhe hi ho ğŸ˜‚. Second year mein main pehli baar high tere aur vedant ke saath hi hua tha ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. text: Cynophobic Namy!!! You are one of the most chillax person I have met at IITK. Kisi cheez ki BT nhi hai tujhe, and you are damn lucky man LMAO. Kisi din main tujhe Lincoln se katva dunga. text: PE se dosti hui thi. Main bhi Kanpur se hun par tera zada pata chalta hai ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Third year se to kafi maze kiye humne. Dikh hi jaate the, kabhi tu Gote ke room pe to kabhi main Hall 2 mein. Kanpur mein plan banate hain kabhi. Cya...

Endsems mein kitne night outs maare yaar humne milke tere room mein. Hum log saath mein na padhte to donon sabme D kha jaate ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Tere saath basketaball khelne mein bhi bohut maza aata tha.
